page.title: 12Leisure and Recreation Cl. 5
page.content: The most popular activities in the Staining area are various sports and gardening. The sports include golf, tennis, badminton, cricket, rugby and snooker. The most popular sport was swimming which was done once or twice a week. Two other popular activities were gardening and DIY. In a survey of our school families most people gave enjoyment as their main reason for following their sport or hobby. They thought they had the benefit of fresh air, excercise and social contact. The sports facilities of Staining village were considered very poor. There is a swimming pool at Newton Hall Camp but it is open only to members of their club and other clubs. For other sports facilities people have to travel to nearby larger towns such as Blackpool or to Stanley Park. Minor sports included parachuting and modelling.
